short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: While shopping for groceries, see useful product information about diet, allergens, ingredients, nutrition and much more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Good Signal is a trusted information source to help you make healthier food choices by providing you with product recommendations and information while you are shopping online. See suggested products you might prefer. Get useful product information such as dietary information, allergens, ingredients and nutrition. Customize your experience with your dietary preferences and restrictions. Good Signal currently supports Amazon.com

FREE TO USE
Good Signal is completely free. We use product data from hundreds of sources to bring you all the product information you want to see in one place.

SUGGESTED PRODUCTS
Perhaps a product has an organic alternative or one without harmful ingredients. We point out similar products that you may prefer.

PRODUCT INFORMATION
Want to know if a product is gluten free, has allergens such as soy or contains too much sugar? See useful product information in a simple, easy-to-use interface.

PERSONALIZED EXPERIENCE
Use our account panel to specify your dietary preferences and restrictions and weâ€™ll tailor the results to your needs. 

SAVE & SHARE PRODUCTS
Like a product? Save it or share it with a friend! View your saved products in the My Products are anytime. 

WE PRESERVE YOUR PRIVACY
Your data is kept private and never shared with third parties. You can also use the service without creating an account and delete your account at any time.

Please contact us at support@goodsignal.com if you have any questions or feedback. We would love to hear from you!

Disclaimer:
We use public data to provide this product information. Please verify this information before using the product.
